title: Savannah Guthrie’s missing mother: Blood on porch, ransom notes surface; family pleads for answers in new video
summary_full: An 84-year-old woman, Nancy Guthrie, mother of "Today" show host Savannah Guthrie, remains missing after her suspected abduction from her Tucson home. Investigators are treating ransom notes demanding millions in bitcoin as credible, with deadlines set for Thursday and Monday. The family has pleaded for direct contact to confirm her well-being.
